alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 7:47PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Delaware and north central Sullivan Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 747 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Meredith to near Andes to 6 miles northeast of Hazel. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Delhi, Roxbury, Kortright, Meredith, Andes, Stamford, Margaretville, Hobart, Fleischmanns and East Meredith. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
